title: Mailvox: a Dread Ilk request
author: VD
content_html:
One of the Dread Ilk has a finalist entry in a flag contest. You can see the contest details here:
http://www.swanseacity.net/news/article/vote-for-your-favourite-swans-flag-3058800.aspx
All anyone needs to do is vote on twitter by tweeting the following:
@SwansOfficial #GlobalSwans Detroit
